description: Circles allows you to share all types of Picniic data with private groups, caregivers, and extended family.
name: Circles

description: the Web App provided users with access to Picniic via their web browser. Rumor is that founder and CTO Ivan Tung built the entire thing in 5 days, living only on ramen and Red Bull
name: Web App

description: the Group Events tile created the opportunity to plan events with friends and get feedback. Group Events was like Doodle without the userbase.
name: Group Events

description: the Ambassador Program allowed Picniic power users to earn money by inviting their friends to use Picniic using their unique referral code. RIP Ambassador Program.. if only Shaunie O'Neal pushed it harder..
name: Ambassador Program

description: Picniic's Referral Program allowed users to earn points for referring their friends to Picniic. Unfortunately, Picniic's users are too wealthy to bother with pesky referral programs
name: Referral Program

description: Pia is an intelligent assistant that assists users in Picniic to create events and surface information
name: Pia

description: the 7 Day Free Trial allowed users to experience the upgraded version of Picniic for 7 days for free.
name: 7 Day Free Trial
